title: Looking for a support s1 +
body:
Just looking to casually climb with someone. 
Currently s1 [here's my op.gg](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=rkentip) so hopefully you're around that rank. Message here or add me IGN: rkentip

replies.body: add me. i main yi support.

hey, I'm S 3 But climbing, I main support, feel like we would gel well together, Main Janna, morgana and leona but can play thresh, raka etc. Added you on league too talk if you like. Cheers,

IGN: iTwistYourFate
